channel.title: A to do list mod request?
channel.description: A few friends on stream came up with an idea to make a mod that makes a to do list similar to buildings however instead resources and just things to do i.e. build coal plant. I personally don't have any experience whatsoever with programming or how difficult something like this would take considering it would add some kind of U.I. I'm sure the community would love something like this!

item.title: A to do list mod request?
item.dc:creator: @IWons_Snowy I Wons Snowy
item.description:
@IWons_Snowy wrote:

Simple notepad also might be helpful for calculating your production lines.

It may be as interface feature or even cooler: it may be an inventory object and you can place notes near some places in factory to which them are related.

Whow, that would be really awesome!

Read full topic
item.source: A to do list mod request?

item.title: A to do list mod request?
item.dc:creator: @IWons_Snowy I Wons Snowy
item.description:
@IWons_Snowy wrote:

Wanted to create same topic and found this.

I join to request. This game need some convenient tool for planning your job. Maybe just simple notepad to make notes?

Please. It should not be hard and will be very popular

Read full topic
